post.title: Live2D Mouth and Chin Chart
post.description: For those who struggle making mouths in Live2D here's a chart with info just for you!
post.content:
For those who struggle making mouths in Live2D here's a chart with info just for you!

I made a mouth+chin chart from my most recent model, for use with Live2d Cubism!

The 0.1 form line and 1.2 open line are optional!

Also, check out @/KiraOmori, @/BunChata, and @/cillia, since I used their charts for ref myself!

(more below)#Live2D #VTuberUprising #Vtuber pic.twitter.com/hfP0h59dWB

— Kozii!ü¶ô‚Ä¢ on vacation~üß≥„ÄêKAWA„Äëüå∫ „Ç≥„Éº„Ç∏„Éº„Å°„ÇÖ (@koziichu) February 14, 2022

BUT WAIT, THERE'S MORE!
I ALWAYS mess with options in Vtube Studio to make sure my mouth tracking works.

For example, if my mouth doesn't close fully, I make the bottom IN setting 0.1

PLEASE mess with your settings to see what works best for you! These are mine rn!#VtubeStudio pic.twitter.com/0ZvKvpiGQm

— Kozii!ü¶ô‚Ä¢ on vacation~üß≥„ÄêKAWA„Äëüå∫ „Ç≥„Éº„Ç∏„Éº„Å°„ÇÖ (@koziichu) February 14, 2022

An example video of my mouth chart PLUS Vtube Studio settings at work! pic.twitter.com/6oV1E7fp8q

— Kozii!ü¶ô‚Ä¢ on vacation~üß≥„ÄêKAWA„Äëüå∫ „Ç≥„Éº„Ç∏„Éº„Å°„ÇÖ (@koziichu) February 14, 2022
